bug.author: szha
bug.summary: requests need upgrade due to security risk (CVE-2018-18074)
bug.description:
Details can be found in <denchmark-link:https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-18074>https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-18074</denchmark-link>
Currently requests are fixed to be below 2.19.0 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/python/setup.py#L33>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/python/setup.py#L33</denchmark-link>
